definition: pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
stroke count (number of brushstrokes of a Chinese character)

sentences.english: I do a little bit of pencil drawing myself in miniature.
sentences.chinese: 我自己會動手畫一些微型鉛筆畫。

sentences.english: However, Li Keran maintained traditional Chinese brushstroke techniques and painting skills.
sentences.chinese: 然而，李可染的畫法又靠了傳統筆畫的表現手法。

sentences.english: Forget growth marks scratched in pencil on the kitchen wall.
sentences.chinese: 廚房牆壁上用鉛筆畫下的身高標記已經成爲歷史。

sentences.english: A little crayon drawing, with annoying transparent strips on it.
sentences.chinese: 蠟筆畫，有些透明的條子在上面，比較討厭。

sentences.english: I looked at the pen and ink drawings.
sentences.chinese: 我看了看那些用鋼筆畫的素描。

sentences.english: These paths may be drawn, and subsequently stroked or filled.
sentences.chinese: 可以繪製這些路徑，並設置筆畫寬度或填充。

sentences.english: Pick up the red pencil and draw an oval on the card of the second pile.
sentences.chinese: 在第二堆上面的卡片上用紅色的鉛筆畫一個橢圓。

sentences.english: But to a computer it’s all just brushstrokes.
sentences.chinese: 但是對於計算機來說，它僅僅是一些筆畫。

sentences.english: I watched him draw a picture with chalk.
sentences.chinese: 我看着他用粉筆畫了一幅畫。

sentences.english: He also can draw pictures for foreign students understanding and remembering Chinese characters.
sentences.chinese: 並且用畫簡筆畫的形式使學生最快速地識別記憶漢字。

sentences.english: She can even look at a line of characters and meanwhile read out their stroke numbers, just like reading a text.
sentences.chinese: 她甚至能像讀課文一樣流利讀出一排文字的筆畫數。
津諾維也夫的一幅鋼筆畫。

sentences.english: Windows and wheels, and smoke, we can use our pencil to draw them on.
sentences.chinese: 車窗和車軲轆，還有煙，我們用筆畫上這些。

sentences.english: Drawing with chalk can be done on paper as a medium and is good for blending colors.
sentences.chinese: 用粉筆畫上可以做芯紙，並作爲用於混合的顏色好。

sentences.english: But path stroking generally produces line drawings that are uninteresting.
sentences.chinese: 但是，筆畫路徑一般只能產生不怎麼有趣的線條圖。

sentences.english: Finally, the strokes, which left by erasing grid-line, are reconstructed.
sentences.chinese: 最後再對因格線刪除而斷開的筆畫進行重構。

definition: variant of 筆畫|笔画[bi3 hua4]
line (in drawing, calligraphy etc)/the lines or contours of a three-dimensional object (hairstyle, clothing, car etc)
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]
style of writing (literary style)/way of writing a character/spelling
Chinese character/CL:個|个[ge4]/Japanese: kanji/Korean: hanja/Vietnamese: hán tự
to contrast/to compare/to place side by side for comparison (as parallel texts)/to check
